pizzaProgram.events
Class Event<EventParamsDataType>

java.lang.Object
  pizzaProgram.events.Event<EventParamsDataType>
Type Parameters:
EventParamsDataType - The data type of the payload that the event is able to hold.

NOTE: use Event<Object> as the default when there is no payload attached!
public class Event<EventParamsDataType>
extends Object

The Event class represents an event that can propagate through various event listeners. A class that implements the EventHandler interface can accept and register to listen for an event

Author:
IT1901 Group 3, Fall 2011

Field Detail

eventParameter

private final EventParamsDataType eventParameter
The data type of the event parameter

eventType

public final String eventType
A string that represents the event type. The value of the event type should be used should be from the EventType class, for the sake of system-wide consistency.

Constructor Detail

Event

public Event(String eventType)
The constructor for creating an event without payload

Parameters:
eventType - A string representing the event type. Please use a constant from EventType for this for the sake of system-wide consistency

Event

public Event(String eventType,
             EventParamsDataType eventParameterObject)
The constructor for creating an instance of Event with a payload attached to it.

Parameters:
eventType - A string representing the event type. Please use a constant from EventType for this for the sake of system-wide consistency
eventParameterObject - A payload object attached to the event.
Method Detail

getEventParameterObject

public EventParamsDataType getEventParameterObject()
A function that can be called to retrieve the payload object.

NOTE: Do NOT modify the object! There may be other event listeners wanting to use this object,

Returns:
the object attached to the event

hasParameterObject

public boolean hasParameterObject()
Returns whether an payload object is attached to the event

Returns:
true if the object has a payload object
